body:
Comment 1: 
there are lots of cases where names could be shadowed, and we certainly don't want to
introduce special syntax for all the cases.

if you really want to "url" as a variable name, then just rename the url package.

i don't think it's a problem big enough
to change the language.
_Labels changed: added **release-none**, **repo-main**, **languagechange**._ _Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
